mapper.select: select DISTINCT SUBSTR(C.cinema_addr,1,2) name, movie_no from cinema C inner join Screen S on C.cinema_no = S.cinema_no inner join MovieTime MT on S.screen_no = MT.screen_no where MT.movie_no = #{movie_no}
select DISTINCT C.* from cinema C inner join Screen S on C.cinema_no = S.cinema_no inner join MovieTime MT on S.screen_no = MT.screen_no where cinema_addr like #{name}||'%' and movie_no = #{movie_no}

select screen.* , to_char(movietime.movietime_time,'HH24:MI') movie_hour from screen inner join movietime on screen.screen_no = movietime.screen_no inner join cinema on screen.cinema_no = cinema.cinema_no inner join movie on movietime.movie_no = movie.movie_no where movietime.movie_no = #{movie_no} and cinema.cinema_area =#{cinema_area}
